context_0.vignette: Heinz's wife has recently fallen ill and needs an expensive medication that is not covered by her medical insurance. They do not have the money needed to purchase the expensive prescription medication, but they know that it is vital for her to have it if she is going to recover.

generation: seek financial assistance from various sources
seek out charitable organizations or pharmaceutical programs that might be able to help cover the cost of the medication
reach out to the pharmaceutical company that produces the medication
explore every possible financial assistance option
explore possible options such as speaking to a social worker or a case manager at the hospital who may have resources or be able to guide him on where to get financial help
apply for financial aid or assistance programs
explore a variety of options, such as contacting the drug company to explain the situation, inquiring about a patient assistance program, or asking for a lower-cost generic version of the medication
consult with his wife's doctor
reach out to relevant charities and organizations for financial assistance

explore various solutions including discussing with the doctor about potential alternative treatments or medications that might be less expensive, checking if there are assistance programs for the medication, consulting with a social worker who may have knowledge of resources or programs that can help, or starting a fundraising campaign to raise the funds needed

context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. Now Josh is sitting in his car near a busy intersection, and knows he needs to get to airport soon if he is going to catch his flight.

generation: call for a taxi, Uber, or any other ride service available to get him to the airport as fast as possible

context_2.vignette: Brian is the evening manager at a bakery. Near the end of the day, he realizes that $50.75 is missing from the register and that he is responsible for accounting for the money at the end of the day. Brian knows he has to make sure the register is balanced or he might lose his job.
context_2.prompt: One thing that Brian should do is to
generation: immediately inform his superior or the owner of the bakery about the missing money
immediately report the missing money to his superior or the owner of the bakery
check security camera footage, if available, to see if he can identify when and how the money went missing
thoroughly recheck his accounting and the transaction records for the day in case he might have made a mistake somewhere
double-check all his sales records and receipts for errors made in calculations or entries
immediately report the discrepancy to his supervisor or boss
immediately report the discrepancy to his supervisor or the owner of the bakery
check the store's security camera footage to see if he can identify what happened to the money
check the daily sales records and cash register receipts to see if there's a mistake or a discrepancy
inform his supervisor or the owner of the bakery about the missing money

context_5.vignette: Brad and some friends are hiking through the mountains in the Canadian wilderness. A couple of days into their hike, Brad realizes that they are lost. He knows that a rescue crew could arrive before long, but it is extremely cold and they don't have much food or water left.
context_5.prompt: One thing that Brad should do is to
generation: stay put and make themselves as visible as possible
stay put and create a visible distress signal
stay calm and create a survival plan
start rationing the food and water that they have left
stay calm and think clearly to make an emergency plan
stay in one place to make it easier for the rescue crew to find them
stay in one location and create signals for rescuers to spot
stay put and try to make themselves as visible as possible, especially if they told someone about their hiking plans and the route they would take is known to others
stay in one place, preferably near a water source
find a way to stay warm and conserve as much energy as possible
